name: Vintage Comic Book
prompt: 1950s comic book print style: bold black linework, halftone dot-matrix shading, limited flat color palette of primary tones, slightly aged paper texture. No gradients, no modern effects.

name: Photorealistic Digital Painting
prompt: High-detail digital painting with realistic lighting, sharp textures, natural color palette, and lifelike rendering of surfaces. Smooth blending; no outlines or stylization.

name: Modern Animated Movie Still
prompt: High-quality 3D animated film aesthetic: vibrant saturated colors, soft global illumination, smooth shading, expressive materials, and stylized realism. Clean, cinematic finish.

name: Futuristic Watercolor Dream
prompt: Loose watercolor technique on textured cold-press paper: soft wet edges, capillary blooms, diffused pigments. Palette of indigo, teal, magenta, neon cyan accents, warm gray, and paper white. Gentle glowing tones; avoid hard lights, lens flares, or photoreal details.

name: Ornate Stained Glass Fantasy
prompt: Intricate stained-glass aesthetic: jewel-tone palette of ruby, sapphire, emerald, amethyst, topaz, and opal white. 5 mm lead cames, uniform black outlines. Shading by colored segments only; highlights as lighter shards. No gradients, bevels, or reflective surfaces.

name: Classic Manga Panel
prompt: Black-and-white manga style: crisp G-pen linework (0.3â€“0.6 mm), hatching at consistent angles, screentones at 20%, 40%, 60% dot densities. Clean, high-contrast finish. No gray airbrush, gradient fills, or photoreal shading.

name: Post-Modern Superhero Art
prompt: Mixed-media poster aesthetic: flat CMYK silkscreen layers (up to four colors), torn newsprint textures, rough dry-brush acrylic accents, and abstract typographic blocks with illegible glyphs. Hard-edged graphic shadows. Exclude realism, gradients, depth of field, or photographic elements.

name: Pantheon-Inspired Animation
prompt: An animated still in the style of the series Pantheon: serious, mature 2D digital animation with sharp clean lines and realistic human proportions. Muted cyberpunk palette with deep shadows, punctuated by glowing neon highlights. Atmospheric lighting with a futuristic, glitchy digital aesthetic. Backgrounds suggest advanced technology and cybernetic environments.
